reviews.review: неплохое мочилово
Headshot!

Es un buen título para jugar en breves periodos de tiempo que no requiere un gran compromiso de tiempo para entenderle ni exige un alto nivel de habilidad para divertirse. La música del juego es buena, pero algo de metal también es una buena combinación para amenizar las partidas.
Я видел школьниц, которые были пострашнее тебя, ха-ха-ха!

Last week I built a gaming rig for my attic that I turned into a spare room/gaming lounge, this was the first game installed on it as with any hardware this runs great and is extremely fun for when my mates come over to play games up on the big screen in 4K.

The Core2Quad and GT740 run the game at 60fps low at 4K resolution without breaking a sweat and I love this game for it's optimization.

It was only cheap and inspired me to get the sequel on console and I enjoyed that as well.

A fun coop zombie shooter which has mostly been superseded by killing floor 2. The enemy variety is not quite as good and the grind is quite high to level classes up fully. However I will always remember everyone going demo and 1 shotting the patrician with c4. Good times.

მარადიული წვალების შემდეგ როგორღაც მოვახერხე ყველა მიღწევის აღება. ალილუია,  800+ საათი და უამრავი მეგობარი/მოგონება. მოდები, ევენთები და დადგა დღე როცა ამ თამაშმა ამოწურა თავისი თავი. ამ თამაშმა თავისი არსით მოსაწყენი ტალღებზე დამოკიდებული კო-ოპერატივი სახალისო გახადა, სთიმზე ჯერ კიდევ ადრეულ დღეებში გამოვიდა. მახსოვს ახალი დარეგისტრირებული ვიყავი ხოლმე და სულ თვალში მეჩხირებოდა. კარგა ხნის მერე გამოვყავი თანხა და არასოდეს არ მინანია ამისი ყიდვა. ყველა იარაღი და ყველა კლასი დავაოსტატე და მრავალი სახალისო მომენტი გავატარე. მაგრამ დროა საბოლოოდ შემოვდო თაროზე საპატიო ადგილას. მშვიდობით!

The game of my childhood, played it cracked before and fall in love with it since. Grew up and bought it on Steam to remind me of those old days. Best online co-op game ever, interesting, scary and fun to play. If you have never played it before, do not hesitate, buy it and you will net regret. 

P.S Unfortunately, devs don't work on it anymore, they just abandoned  it, what is very sad, because it is masterpiece.

Honestly loved this more than KF2 for the longest time. Had/has a much grittier feel to it, has OG players still around and a good workshop with mods. Play this with some ultraviolent music and you'll have a ton of fun.

good old killingfloor. before KF2 we had this. running on the unreal engine made originally for unreal tournament series. it's a fun and stable horror first person shooter with a perk system which you can level-up
the more you play the better and stronger you get. dont expect this to look ultra HD on 4K because it wont!
this is classic and only for players that just want to have a little fun and or wanted to know what killingfloor was like before it got better ;)

I can't believe I haven't reviewed this. I've been playing this game on and off for years and it's one of the first PC coop games I played with my friends. It's a bit clunky, the jump in difficulty between normal is hard is crazy, and it takes forever to level up perks, but I still keep coming back. Even after the 2nd game has come out and is arguably a better game, this is the one I play. Why? I'm not totally sure. Maybe because it's fairly straightforward. I play on low difficulties, turn off the brain and blow up some zombie heads. Or maybe it's because I love the medic class and there's the challenge of hitting healing darts on fleeing teammates. Whatever it is, I've thoroughly enjoyed Killing Floor and is still one of my favourite coop games out there

Its just epic.

Juego de co-op excelencia, adictivo y desafiante, si eres de esas personas que se cansan con los juegos con formula "repetitiva" entonces este juego te aburrira facilmente, el killing floor solo tiene 2 modos de juego y solo 1 lo juegan la mayoria el modo oleada.

El Killing Floor empezo como el mejor mod para colocarle al UT2k4 (juegazo) como una especie de survival horror con modo historia y online (kfmod 1.0) con varias inspiraciones de los clones de Hitman, los infectados de Resident evil y el terror de Silent hill, que se creo un buen mix de juego, esta version del  juego es el retail del 2009, el juego contiene muchos DLC pero solo 2 valen la pena, los otros no valen la pena o son cosmeticos (personajes).

Si vives en LatinoAmerica, entonces tenemos la suerte de tener los servidores mas populados de Killing floor, por que HAY demasiados y populados en los fines de semana. Es jugable hasta 170 de ping. Vamos que los gringos nos tienen envidia :P

Столько проведённых ночей с топором на перевес против сотен зомби уже никогда не будет ни в одной игре. Берсам респект и всем кто с нами.

1. [u]Gaphics[/u] [i]8/10[/i] (An amazing game with the theme of zombies and mutants. I had a problem running the game. I couldn‘t play in cooperative mode. But I must admit that the maps and characters are good. The gloomy, dark and rugged scenarios, in every corner lurking the strange mutants in the form of hordes. It doesn‘t have a complex story, but it is rewarded by the design of the enemies, the bloody executions and the locations on the map. There are a variety of enemies with distinctive features. [i]The worst enemy will be etched in your memory[/i].) 

2. [u]Playability[/u] [i]8/10[/i] (The controls are simple, but at same time a bit complex. You can easily adapt to the controls and the position of camera. I think different camera perspectives can be used in the game. This game is based on skill points. [spoiler]Depending on the role in the game, such skill points will need to be considered and increased over time in each game played[/spoiler]. Although, some controls like healing is a bit clunky or reaction laggy.)

3. [u]Music and FX[/u] [i]9/10[/i] (About the soundtrack of the game, I can only say that it’s incredible music. Sometimes you’ll listen to ambient music (electronic dark ambient and minimal). Other times you’ll listen to devastating music: metal, breakcore, noise and industrial music. That kind of tension generated by music, music to dismember and to slash enemies, reminds me a bit of [i]Doom 3[/i]. Music appears in a timely manner in the game. So if you‘re killing zombies, music will be a company in times of tension.)

4. [u]Duration[/u] [i]9/10[/i] (The game has a great variety of maps with different durations. Each map contains a level of difficulty. [spoiler]At the end of each wave, a shop will open to stock up, buy or sell weapons, and retrieve inventory worn out in combat[/spoiler]. The game has a workshop, where you can change the appearance of weapons or characters. You can play in solo or cooperative mode. Unfortunately, I was never able to access the cooperative mode. )

Really fun zombie shooter.

Sencillo y efectivo, un título de culto que habla por sí solo. A pesar de que tiene sus años se sigue manteniendo firme a la hora de buscar servidores en línea. Rock de fondo y un variado arsenal se convierten en la receta perfecta a la hora de hacer catarsis matando especímenes. Como no podía ser de otra manera, jugarlo en solitario puede llegar a ser aburrido.

This game and Left 4 Dead 2 are probably my favorite zombie shoot-em-ups ever. I love the seasonal changes to the specimens and the concepts of all the specimen. Character skins are fantastic and the various different weapons are great. Only issue is that a lot of the best weapons in the game are essentially DLC, other than that, fantastic game.
